name: alibaba.einvoice.income.scan.return
description: 回传进项扫描每个阶段的状态，比如ocr开始，ocr结束，查验开始，查验结束等

requestParams.name: status
requestParams.description: 扫描状态，0=开始ocr，1=ocr结束，2=开始查验，3=查验结束

requestParams.name: invoice_count
requestParams.description: 该批次对应的发票数量，扫描结束和查验结束status=1，3时必填

requestParams.name: success
requestParams.description: 驱动是否成功，true=成功，false=失败
